channel.title: Game crashs after starting..
channel.description:
Hey guys, I've got a annoying problem. When I start Black Mesa via Steam, it starts normally, the "Creating Audio-Storage" Window appears... it frezzes for 5sec, the game crashs and this window pops up:
Black Mesa: hl2.exe - Error in application The order in "0x11322edd" refers to storage in "0x0edb1454". The process "read" could not be performed on the storage.
Click "Ok" to terminate the application.
I've already: -reinstalled Steam and Black Mesa -deactivated my soundcard before starting the game (because it always crashs when creating the audio-storage.. didn't help though lol)
Any ideas how I could fix this? I really want to play this awesome mod :frowning: And yes, the Source SDK Base 2007 is installed.

item.title: Game crashs after starting..

item.description:
Conti:

Please check the Q5 of this FAQ to see if it solves your problem.

Thanks! -dxlevel90 solved the problem Thread can be closed/deleted

item.title: Game crashs after starting..
item.dc:creator: Zer0o
item.description:
Hey guys, I’ve got a annoying problem. When I start Black Mesa via Steam, it starts normally, the “Creating Audio-Storage” Window appears… it frezzes for 5sec, the game crashs and this window pops up:

Black Mesa: hl2.exe - Error in application
The order in “0x11322edd” refers to storage in “0x0edb1454”. The process “read” could not be performed on the storage.

Click “Ok” to terminate the application.

I’ve already:
-reinstalled Steam and Black Mesa
-deactivated my soundcard before starting the game (because it always crashs when creating the audio-storage… didn’t help though lol)

Any ideas how I could fix this? I really want to play this awesome mod And yes, the Source SDK Base 2007 is installed.
